name: Sonoco Products Company
description: Sonoco Products Company is a global provider of diversified consumer packaging, industrial products, and protective solutions. Founded in 1899 and headquartered in Hartsville, South Carolina, Sonoco operates in more than 35 countries, serving a wide range of industries including food, personal care, healthcare, and electronics. The company is recognized for its commitment to sustainability and innovation, having developed numerous eco-friendly packaging solutions that meet the growing demand for environmentally responsible products. Sonoco’s product portfolio includes rigid containers, flexible packaging, paperboard tubes, and molded fiber products, as well as specialized packaging for delicate items. With a robust focus on customer collaboration, Sonoco aims to deliver tailored solutions that enhance the value of its clients’ products while reducing environmental impact. The company invests heavily in research and development to improve its offerings and maintain its industry-leading position. Sonoco is not only dedicated to providing high-quality packaging solutions but also strives to foster community engagement and responsible sourcing across its supply chain. Its mission is to be the most trusted partner for packaging solutions, thereby contributing positively to the global economy and environment.
